Adductor Brevis.name: Adductor Brevis
Adductor Brevis.origin: Front of the inferior pubic ramus just below the origin of the adductor longus
Adductor Brevis.insertion: Lower 2/3 of the pectineal line of the femur and the upper half of the medial lip of the linea aspera

Adductor Longus.name: Adductor Longus
Adductor Longus.origin: Anterior pubis just below its crest

Adductor Magnus.name: Adductor Magnus
Adductor Magnus.origin: Edge of the en- tire pubic ramus and the ischium and ischial tuberosity
Adductor Magnus.insertion: Whole length of the linea aspera, inner condyloid ridge, and adductor tubercle

Anconeus.name: Anconeus
Anconeus.origin: Posterior surface of the lateral condyle of the humerus
Anconeus.insertion: Posterior surface of the lateral olecranon process and proximal 1/4 of the ulna

Biceps Brachii Long Head.name: Biceps Brachii Long Head
Biceps Brachii Long Head.origin: Supraglenoid tubercle above the superior lip of the glenoid fossa
Biceps Brachii Long Head.insertion: Tuberosity of the radius and bicipital aponeurosis (lacertus fibrosis)

Biceps Brachii Short Head.name: Biceps Brachii Short Head
Biceps Brachii Short Head.origin: Coracoid process of the scapula and upper lip of the glenoid fossa in conjunction with the proximal attachment of the coracobrachialis
Biceps Brachii Short Head.insertion: Tuberosity of the radius and bicipital aponeurosis (lacertus fibrosis)

Biceps Femoris.name: Biceps Femoris
Biceps Femoris.origin: Long head: ischial tuberosity. Short head: lower half of the linea aspera, and lateral condyloid ridge
Biceps Femoris.insertion: Head of the fibula and lateral condyle of the tibia

Gastrocnemius.name: Gastrocnemius
Gastrocnemius.origin: Posterior surface of lateral condyle of femur
Gastrocnemius.insertion: Upper posterior medial surface of tibia

Brachialis.name: Brachialis
Brachialis.origin: Distal half of the anterior shaft of the humerus

Brachio-Radialis.name: Brachio-Radialis
Brachio-Radialis.origin: Distal 2/3 of the lateral condyloid (supracondylar) rydge of the humerus
Brachio-Radialis.insertion: Lateral surface of the distal end of the radius and the styloid process

Deltoid Posterior Fibers.name: Deltoid Posterior Fibers
Deltoid Posterior Fibers.origin: Inferior edge of spine of ulna

Gluteus Maximus.name: Gluteus Maximus
Gluteus Maximus.origin: Posterior 1/4 of the crest of the ilium, posterior surface of the sacrum and coccyx near the ilium, and fascia of the lumbar area
Gluteus Maximus.insertion: Oblique ridge on the lateral surface of the greater trochanter and the iliotibial band of the fasciae latae

Gluteus Medius.name: Gluteus Medius
Gluteus Medius.origin: Lateral surface of the ilium just below the crest
Gluteus Medius.insertion: Posterior and middle surfaces of the greater trochanter of the femur

Gluteus Minimus.name: Gluteus Minimus
Gluteus Minimus.origin: Lateral surface of the ilium just below the origin of the gluteus medius
Gluteus Minimus.insertion: Anterior surface of the greater trochanter of the femur

Gracilis.name: Gracilis
Gracilis.origin: Anteromedial edge of the descending ramus of the pubis
Gracilis.insertion: Anterior medial surface of the tibia below the condyle

Iliacus.name: Iliacus
Iliacus.insertion: Lesser trochanter of the femur and shaft just below
action: Transverse pelvic rotation contralaterally when ipsilateral femur is stabilized

Infra-spinatus.name: Infra-spinatus
Infra-spinatus.origin: Infraspinous fossa just below spine of scapula
Infra-spinatus.insertion: Posteriorly on greater tubercle of humerus

Latissimus Dorse.name: Latissimus Dorse
Latissimus Dorse.origin: Posterior crest of ilium, back of sacrum and spinous processes of lumbar and lower six thoracic vertebrae, slips from lower three ribs
Latissimus Dorse.insertion: Medial side of intertubercular groove of humerus, just anterior to the insertion of the teres major

Pectineus.name: Pectineus
Pectineus.origin: Space 1 inch wide on the front of the pubis just above the crest
Pectineus.insertion: Rough line leading from the lesser trochanter down to the linea aspera

Pectoralis Major upper fibers.name: Pectoralis Major upper fibers
Pectoralis Major upper fibers.origin: Medial half of anterior surface of clavicle
Pectoralis Major upper fibers.insertion: Flat tendon 2-3 inches wide to lateral lip of intertubercular groove of humerus

Pectoralis Major lower fibers.name: Pectoralis Major lower fibers
Pectoralis Major lower fibers.origin: Anterior surface of costal cartilages of first six ribs, and adjoining portion of sternum
Pectoralis Major lower fibers.insertion: Flat tendon 2-3 inches wide to lateral lip of intertubercular groove of humerus

Pronator Quadratus.name: Pronator Quadratus
Pronator Quadratus.origin: Distal 1/4 of the anterior side of the ulna
Pronator Quadratus.insertion: Distal 1/4 of the anterior side of the radius

Pronator teres.name: Pronator teres
Pronator teres.origin: Distal part of the medial condyloid ridge of the humerus and medial side of the proximal ulna
Pronator teres.insertion: Middle 1/3 of the lateral surface of the radius

Psoas major and minor.name: Psoas major and minor
Psoas major and minor.origin: Lower borders of the transverse processes (L1–L5), sides of the bodies of the last thoracic vertebra (T12), the lumbar vertebrae (L1–L5), intervertebral fibrocartilages, and base of the sacrum
Psoas major and minor.insertion: Lesser trochanter of the femur and shaft just below psoas minor; pectineal line (of pubis) and iliopectineal eminence
action: Transverse pelvic rotation contralaterally when ipsilateral femur is stabilized
Lateral flexion of the lumbar spine

Rectus Femoris.name: Rectus Femoris
Rectus Femoris.origin: Anterior inferior iliac spine of the ilium and groove (posteior) above the acetabulum
Rectus Femoris.insertion: Superior aspect of the patella and patella tendon to the tibial tuberosity

Sartorius.name: Sartorius
Sartorius.origin: Anterior superior iliac spine and notch just below the spine
Sartorius.insertion: Anterior medial surface of the tibia just below the condyle

Semimembranosus.name: Semimembranosus
Semimembranosus.insertion: Posteromedial surface of the medial tibial condyle

Semitendinosus.name: Semitendinosus
Semitendinosus.insertion: Upper anterior medial surface of the tibia just below the condyle

Sub-scapularis.name: Sub-scapularis
Sub-scapularis.origin: Entire anterior surface of subscapular fossa

Supinator.name: Supinator
Supinator.origin: Lateral epicondyle of the humerus and the neighboring posterior part of the ulna
Supinator.insertion: Lateral surface of the proximal radius just below the head

Supra-spinatus.name: Supra-spinatus
Supra-spinatus.insertion: Superiorly on greater tubercle of humerus

Teres Major.name: Teres Major
Teres Major.origin: Posteriorly on inferior third of lateral border of scapula and just superior to the inferior angle
Teres Major.insertion: Medial lip of intertubercular groove of humerus, just posterior to the insertion of the latissimus dorsi

Teres Minor.name: Teres Minor
Teres Minor.origin: Posteriorly on upper and middle aspect of lateral border of scapula
Teres Minor.insertion: Posteriorly on greater tubercle of humerus

Triceps Brachii Lateral Head.name: Triceps Brachii Lateral Head
Triceps Brachii Lateral Head.origin: Upper half of the posterior surface of the humerus

Triceps Brachii Long Head.name: Triceps Brachii Long Head
Triceps Brachii Long Head.origin: Infraglenoid tubercle below inferior lip of the glenoid fossa of the scapula

Triceps Brachii Medial Head.name: Triceps Brachii Medial Head
Triceps Brachii Medial Head.origin: Distal 2/3 of the posterior surface of the humerus

Vastus Medialis.name: Vastus Medialis
Vastus Medialis.origin: Whole length of linea aspera and medial condyloid ridge
Vastus Medialis.insertion: Medial half of upper border of patella and patellar tendon to tibial tuberosity

Vastus Lateralis.name: Vastus Lateralis
Vastus Lateralis.origin: Intertrochanteric line, anterior and inferior borders of the greater trochanter, gluteal tuberosity, upper half of the linea aspera, and entire lateral intermuscular septum
Vastus Lateralis.insertion: Lateral border of the patella and patellar tendon to tibial tuberosity

Vastus Intermedius.name: Vastus Intermedius
Vastus Intermedius.origin: Upper 2/3 of anterior surface of femur
Vastus Intermedius.insertion: Upper border of the patella and patellar tendon to tibial tuberosity

Popliteus.name: Popliteus
Popliteus.origin: Posterior surface of lateral condyle of femur
Popliteus.insertion: Upper posterior medial surface of tibia

Obturator Externus.name: Obturator Externus
Obturator Externus.insertion: Posterior aspect of the greater trochanter immediately below obturator internus

Obturator Internus.name: Obturator Internus
Obturator Internus.insertion: Posterior aspect of the greater trochanter with gamellus superior

Gemellus Inferior.name: Gemellus Inferior
Gemellus Inferior.insertion: Posterior aspect of the greater trochanter with obturator internus

Gemellus Superior.name: Gemellus Superior
Gemellus Superior.insertion: Posterior aspect of the greater trochanter immediately below piriformis

Piriformis.name: Piriformis
Piriformis.origin: Anterior sacrum, posterior portions of the ischium, and obturator foramen
Piriformis.insertion: Superior and posterior aspect of the greater trochanter

Tensor Fasciae Latae.name: Tensor Fasciae Latae
Tensor Fasciae Latae.origin: Anterior iliac crest and surface of the ilium just below the crest
Tensor Fasciae Latae.insertion: One-fourth of the way down the thigh into the iliotibial tract, which in turn inserts onto Gerdy’s tubercle of the anterolateral tibial condyle

Coraco-brachialis.name: Coraco-brachialis
Coraco-brachialis.insertion: Middle of medial border of humeral shaft
